summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented via a new admin no-auth mode flag and updates to AdminGuard and AdminLoginPage to bypass Internet Identity/admin checks and allow direct entry to /admin. Backend changes required for REQ-3 are not evidenced in the provided (truncated) backend diff summary, so implementation of permission-bypass for admin-only endpoints cannot be confirmed. Several unrelated frontend changes/utilities appear added/modified that were not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Temporarily disable backend admin permission enforcement for all admin-only endpoints so admin UI operations work for an unauthenticated/anonymous caller while temporary no-auth mode is enabled.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend diff shown is truncated and does not include any visible changes demonstrating that admin-only methods (e.g., getAllOrders, updateOrderStatus, products/offers CRUD, customers list/detail) no longer enforce admin authorization. No explicit evidence of bypass/removal of admin checks is present in the provided snippet.

hallucinated_features.description: Added URL/sessionStorage parameter persistence utilities implying token/state persistence across navigation (e.g., comments referencing admin tokens).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to disable admin authentication/permission checks temporarily; it did not request adding URL parameter/session persistence helpers or any token-handling utilities.

hallucinated_features.description: Customer cart page updated (UI/behavior changes around cart rendering and checkout navigation).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is admin authentication/authorization bypass; it did not request modifications to customer-facing cart page behavior/UI.

hallucinated_features.description: Customer list page UI/logic changes (search/filter, cards, totals).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of temporarily disabling admin authentication; this is an admin UI enhancement unrelated to the authentication gate removal itself.

hallucinated_features.description: Products management page enhancements including image upload/preview/progress handling.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; the request is about disabling admin auth checks, not adding/changing product management functionality.
